title: Doubutsu Kankyou Kaigi

synonyms: The Animal Conference on the Environment

synopsis:
The Animal Conference on the Environment is a fun animated series through which children can learn about environmental issues and explore different cultures. Animals from all over the world, each with their own unique personality and backstory, get together and discuss the environment around them. By sharing information, prejudices, and misconceptions, they come to understand each other and value the environment.

(Source: Official site)
